snippet: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey, a Republican the left seemed to warm to after Hurricane Sandy, was less enthusiastically received in banter with Jon Stewart.
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie, Republican that the left seemed to warm to after Hurricane Sandy, endures half-hour of grilling on liberal lion's den that is The Daily Show With Jon Stewart.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey, a Republican the left seemed to warm to after Hurricane Sandy, was less enthusiastically received in banter with Jon Stewart.

headline.seo: Christie Gets No Hug on ‘Daily Show,’ Even After Hurricane
headline.main: On ‘Daily Show,’ No Hug for Christie
headline.print_headline: On Talk Show, No Hug for Christie
